016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
020import org.apache.maven.model.PluginExecution;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.DefaultInvocationRequest;
025import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationRequest;
026import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.Invoker;
028import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
029import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
030import org.slf4j.Logger;
031import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
032import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
033
034import javax.inject.Inject;
035import javax.inject.Singleton;
036import java.io.File;
037import java.util.Collections;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
040
041import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.*;
042
043/**
044 * Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
045 *
046 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
047 * @since 1.1
048 */
049@Singleton
050public class ExecutorService {
051
052    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ExecutorService.class);
053
054    private final MojoExecutor.ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment;
055    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
056    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
057    private final Invoker invoker;
058
059    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
060    @Inject
061    public ExecutorService(MavenProject mavenProject, MavenSession mavenSession, BuildPluginManager pluginManager,
062                           Invoker invoker) {
063        this.executionEnvironment = executionEnvironment(mavenProject, mavenSession, pluginManager);
064        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
065        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
066        this.invoker = invoker;
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Executes the given goal from the given plugin coordinates.
071     *
072     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId:version
073     * @param goal The goal to execute
074     * @throws MojoExecutionException If the goal execution fails
075     */
076    public void executeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MojoExecutionException {
077        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(pluginKey);
078        if (plugin != null) {
079            AtomicReference<String> executionId = new AtomicReference<>(goal);
080            if (goal != null && goal.indexOf('#') > -1) {
081                int pos = goal.indexOf('#');
082                executionId.set(goal.substring(pos + 1));
083                goal = goal.substring(0, pos);
084            }
085            Optional<PluginExecution> execution = plugin
086                    .getExecutions()
087                    .stream()
088                    .filter(e -> e.getId().equals(executionId.get()))
089                    .findFirst();
090            Xpp3Dom configuration;
091            if (execution.isPresent()) {
092                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) execution.get().getConfiguration();
093            } else if (plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
094                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
095            } else {
096                configuration = configuration();
097            }
098            executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
099        } else {
100            throw new MojoExecutionException("Plugin not found: " + pluginKey);
101        }
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Executes a goal using the given arguments.
106     *
107     * @param pluginGroup plugin group id
108     * @param pluginArtifact plugin artifact id
109     * @param pluginVersion plugin version
110     * @param goal goal to execute
111     * @param configuration configuration for the goal
112     * @throws MojoExecutionException if the goal execution fails
113     */
114    public void executeGoal(String pluginGroup, String pluginArtifact, String pluginVersion, String goal, Xpp3Dom configuration) throws MojoExecutionException {
115        final Plugin plugin = plugin(pluginGroup, pluginArtifact, pluginVersion);
116        executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
117    }
118
119    /**
120     * Executes a goal using the Maven shared invoker.
121     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId
122     * @param goal The goal to execute
123     * @return The result of the invocation
124     * @throws MavenInvocationException If the goal execution fails
125     */
126    public InvocationResult invokeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MavenInvocationException {
127        InvocationRequest request = new DefaultInvocationRequest();
128        request.setPomFile(mavenProject.getFile());
129        File settingsFile = mavenSession.getRequest().getUserSettingsFile();
130        if (settingsFile.exists()) {
131            request.setUserSettingsFile(settingsFile);
132        }
133        request.setGoals(Collections.singletonList(pluginKey + ":" + goal));
134        request.setBatchMode(true);
135        request.setQuiet(true);
136        request.setErrorHandler(LOG::error);
137        request.setOutputHandler(LOG::info);
138        return invoker.execute(request);
139    }
140}
